Dude this is a game that you can play with a bad laptop. I played this baby for hours on end until my laptop literally fried. Totally worth it. Get on this game, it's time for some sweating!

The game consistently follows a balanced system and doesn't follow an OP-type meta where casuals and competitors can enjoy games without thinking a certain part of the game is unbalanced. Although the game goes through couple updates per quarter of the year, they're not as drastic and can be easy to follow and learn. Better for all gamers.
